aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-1682-800 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Electronic warfare system false alerts. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 14/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 17/02/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/02/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 21/02/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 23/02/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
